title: SonicWall security advisory (AV26-161)
description: On February 24, 2026, SonicWall published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Gen7 hardware Firewalls  version 7.0.1-5169 and prior
Gen7 virtual Firewalls (NSv)  version 7.3.1-7013 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
